body_html: @YinTaiChen Thanks for translating the tutorial into Traditional Chinese! The translation looks great and there are just a few places where we could probably discuss a bit on the word choice. Wondering do you use any instant messaging apps like Messenger? Maybe we can chat on it to have a closer look at script. Thanks!
